segments.text: We have a great variety of Chinese antiques . Besides , we have landscape painting , figure painting and flower-and-bird painting .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How about this picture of cranes with pine trees ? It was painted by a famous Chinese painter in King Dynasty .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , they look just like live cranes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And what is more , in traditional Chinese thinking , cranes and pine trees symbolize longevity .
segments.speaker: S2
